1.content: Who's side are you on?
1.title: Intergalatic factions

11.content:
This story is special because there is a twist (Or not) to the invasion. Note that the aliens can come from any movie, game, or book that has aliens in them like Aliens vs Predator, Destroy all humans, mass effect, any others, or just make up one. Oh and note that there will not be a listing for the alien species, so you can just put in an alien species that is attacking and say they are from star wars, mass effect, or say you just made it up.

Size Diffrence: The invading aliens are significantly bigger (Or smaller) than humans

Technological diffrence: Either the humans have equal or more advanced technology, or they are primitive (More primitive, as in things like the cavemen, medival, classic, etc, anything lower than what we have today.

Zombie invasion: The humans are already at war with zombies, so the aliens have to take care of them first.

Fallout: Self-explanitory, the world is in wastelands, there are factions everywhere, there are guns and energy weapons, and there is alot of radiation and mutants.
11.title: Twists n' Turns

111.content: But, which size? By the way, you can use the size diffrence as a way to organize species of aliens like if they are already big or small, but it is more fun to mess with size.
111.title: Size Diffrence

1111.content:
Sometimes size matters, and sometimes it doesn't.

Short: As in like 3 feet tall or somewhere around that, like the size of a midget or child.

small: as in below 1 foot tall, ain't that a bitch?
1111.title: Smaller

11111.content:
The Xendakk, a 2.5 foot tall reptilian race that augments its stature with advanced technology. Believing that reptiles are the master species, they spread through the stars, subjugating all non-reptilian species they encounter. Introducing their own native plants and animals to the planets, and terraforming each new planet into a tropical world.

Males have feather crests and a dewlap (look it up) and have bright colors, while females have no feathers, and tend to have muted colors.
11111.title: They are just...short

choices: A mid 20s American girl during the signal
A third world citizen watching the first world bow to the invaders
111111.content:
Sik-Dik eyed the screen eagerly, this world was covered in water, and already had several rainforests across the equatorial zone, this would make an excellent world to invade. Signaling his assistants, they transmitted the location of the next planet to the Silverhelm, the leader of all the master race.

"Fleetmaster," one assistant said, presenting him with a datapad, "this world has native, somewhat intelligent life on it. Mammallsss...." The assistant hissed out the last word like the vile word it was.

Sik-Dik looked over the datapad, "Hmmm...It seems though they are advanced enough for complicated electronics, and such devices are fairly widespread. Let's use those as the vanguard, begin the passification broadcast!"

The various minions scattered around, tapping into each and every satellite and communications tower on the planet, and began to broadcast their signal. It was a fairly simple operation, anyone looking at a screen or using a communication system device would find their loyalties now to the Silverhelm, and acknowledging their inferiority to the Xendakk. Of course the more primitive places would have to be pacified the conventional way, but that never took too long.
111111.title: Yes, Xendakk invade

11113.content: below 5 inches: Pretty much bug alien things
11113.title: smaller things

1112.content:
When I mean bigger, I mean bigger

100 feet tall

1000 feet tall
1112.title: Bigger

11121.content:
The Karvox are a race of large mammalian creatures, with extremely stocky and sturdy bodies. Their bodies are covered in black fur and they have flat, grey, wrinkly faces that appear to be permanently stuck in a condescending frown. Their size varies between 80 feet to 120 feet, and averages out at about 100 feet. Their species has little sexual dimorphism, with females looking a lot like males, except with larger breasts and wider hips.

Their species is extremely aggressive and warlike. They value blind obedience, discipline, strength and most importantly size. They value size so much, that their chain of command is based not on tactics or experience, but on size and strength. They march into battle wearing heavy full body armor and wielding very large kinetic weapons.

Their home planet is barren and frigid world. Upon conquering a new planet, they exterminate the natives, pillage whatever resources they can, and they begin terraforming it to be much colder like their homeworld. They have little respect for smaller races.
11121.title: 100 Feet

choices: Furons (When I mean Furons I mean Crypto)
1113.content: Gotta love these things, now to be specific. The alien species can grow at will or shrink you, this is basically one of the only times that there will be freewill on what you will pick.
1113.title: Size manipulation

choices: Crypto uses the PLUS on himself
Crypto uses the minus somewhere else
11131.content:
For a long expanse of time, Pox has been researching and creating a machine/weapon that can manipulate a beings matter and either grow or shrink it's stature. Since the destruction of the base in space the data stored inside was blasted along with other data cores for other weapons across the earth and even the moon. For a long time Pox has been searching for any data pods for weapons by scanning area's that had any recent foundings of space debris. And now that time has now begun.

While Crypto was out blasting humans, fighting the military, and blasting more humans in the ass, halo-pox was scanning certain area's that had any source of data pods that are related to the experiment, then a signal was found somewhere in Japan and was traced specifically around Tokyo.
"Crypto!" Pox radioed and heard alot of gunfire and explosions with humans screaming for their lives
"What?! Did I do something wrong with this mission? I am not going to do this all over again!" Crypto responded
"Get back to the saucer this very instant! I have found something that can benefit both of us"
"You mean you and I am practically at the doorknob of finishing this damn mission you gave me!"
"Fine, after you finish get back this instant!"

10 minutes later

Crypto entrered the saucer and was setting to saucer to the location
"So where is this important thing?" Crypto questioned
"In Tokyo Crypto" Pox responded
"Tokyo? Have you been watching this planets anime and Japan movies? Damn Poxy"
"Don't get smug with me Crypto, let's go to Tokyo!" Pox yelled and the saucer jumped to warp-speed to the designation
"Am I going to fight a giant monster like the last time?"
"Not really, you are going to find a very special weapon I have been creating"

They arrived in Tokyo and Pox gave Crypto the coordinates of where the weapon is. After a while Crypto found it in an abandoned old warehouse where as, when he activated it it looked looked like his zap-o-matic except that it has a red minus and a green plus, also the energy in it was fluctuating in diffrent colors.
"What in the blazes does this do?"
11131.title: Backstories and Tokyo

choices: Get back to the saucer, grow it, and massive doom
111311.content:
"Crypto, did you find it?" Pox questioned as Crypto just screwed around with the controls and accidentally shot himself with the gun in which he started glowing green and started growing bigger, slowly, but surely
"Yes I did and I like it alot" Crypto said in a evil tone
"Let me guess, you grew yourself didn't you?" Then Crypto's head touched the ceiling
"Yes, accidentally, but now I am going to have alot of fun"
"Well, good luck with that"

10 minutes later* What could possibly happen in 10 minutes...oh wait its Crypto, well Tokyo is screwed.

Pox was in the saucer in his halo-disk, thing and was watching the Tokyo news, in which he saw live footage of a news helicopter recording the rampage of a 100 ft. Crypto stepping on humans, vehicles, and buildings using only his bare-hands
"You insignificant earth monkeys! You couldn't even beat me when I was smaller, how do you expect to kll me now when I am bigger than you!" Then came the army with their infantry, tanks, and fighter-jets, and they fired everything they had and all of that were snuffed out by Crypto's shield which didn't even break, let alone even decreasing the shield's health. When the military finished their assault, Crypto brought out his Zap-o-matic and basically fried the military force in one fell swoop. What remained were ashes of the militaries failed attempt and the wrecked streets and buildings that were in the vincinity of the electricity. Then Crypto continued stomping through the city

"Well, I saw that several parsecs away...now where is Gastro to clean all that up?"

-Back to Crypto

"Ah, the smell of destruction and burning earth monkey's, but this is getting boring, I think it was time to-"
111311.title: The bigger they are, the more they destroy

115.content:
Do you belive in magic?: The humans can use magic, it will be a fight of magic vs technology

Robotic overlords: Instead of fighting humans, you are fighting robots who rebeled against their creaters and extinguished the entire race (Or so they thought)
115.title: More twists

1153.content:
No twist: A short and simple no twist, our current technology against their advanced technology

Faction world: (Basically off my story faction chronicles) The humans have anthro allies, the world has alot of factions with differed technology and magic.
1153.title: nope, more

11533.content: Dragon world: The world is infested with dragons of all kinds with diffrent abilities and magic, there are hardly any humans, and there are alot of dragons
11533.title: More twists bro

12.content: Humans are everywhere in the world, when this happened where were you? Oh and remember this is our own technology vs theirs (But we can still steal theirs >:D) Also the reason there are diffrent locations is that it determines what kinds of aliens are attacking us.
12.title: Human

122.content:
Didn't you hear? The United States is the only country UFOs ever seem to land in. Or at least the only place our heroes come from.

So just before you charge headlong into the hordes of little green men, how about we find out where exactly is this urban area you come from.
122.title: Invaders Must Die

choices: Or maybe on a cruise ship?
1251.content: So...why are you over there? Are you...
1251.title: Out on the open sea

choices: Nope more...wait is this in Canada?
1253.title: more locations

12532.content:
It was a week into Exercise Kangaroo 2016, a new joint-military Exercise bringing countries such as the US, Philippines, Singapore and Britain. The point of this was to demonstrate the ability to co-operate with each other in a combat situation.

Private (PTE) John Porter was 19 years old, joined the Army as soon as he hit 17. John was assigned to B Company, 1st Battalion, Royal Australian Regiment. He was a good shot, all though his firearm was a standard EF88 Austeyr, he was capable of firing weapons such as the HK-417. John's company had returned from a simulated combat scenario against a USMC company. He, like everyone else, was knackered and went to sleep as soon as they could.

John was a typical Aussie bloke, he had light brown hair, blue eyes and was 6"2 with a muscular build. All his life he had wanted to be in the Army, after his father before him, and his father before him. In the middle of his sleep, he was woken by the Staff Sergeant, who went from room to room, waking everyone up and informing them on briefing in five minutes.

Like the rest of the young males in his room, he got up and threw on his boots, shirt and prepared his bed.
"Another night ops..." commented one of John's mates, Bryan Pearce. Bryan was a Lance Corporal, but was a chilled individual, and only wanted to be addressed as 'Lance Corporal' went a senior NCO or CO was present. He had ash blonde hair and brown eyes, with a prominent jaw. Bryan was around the same height and build as John.
"Not enough beauty sleep for ya'?" asked John with a grin on his face. Bryan smirked and jokingly told him to "bugger off".

After a briefing, the entirety of B Coy was in Bushmaster PMVs and moblised to react to an intrusion that was said to be within the training facility. All though the ammunition that was supplied were live rounds, the men of John's Squad spoke while riding in the Bushmaster, and came to their own conclusion that it was just an exercise.
12532.title: Introduction

125331.content:
In the deep clutches of Antarctica lay several types of facilities, some for research, others for mining under the thick ice from a recent discovery of some sort of unknown minerals or giant thing that is disclosed to the public. You are a part of a rescue team sent to one of these facilities after losing contact with most of them for unknown reason's, but the last radio signals said enough to know that they were attack and needed assistance.

Alpha team was sent out to a mining facility deep in the thick of the arctic, which they discovered a large and massive underground ancient structure of some kind.

Bravo Team was sent to a research facility that recently discovered a meteor, which a few hours after that, there was radio silence.

Sorry, but you aren't apart of Alpha nor Bravo team, you are a part of these teams.

Charlie Team was sent out to a facility that stretches wide and far on the surface and underground. It's been known to have electrical disturbances and its usually dark or dim in some places, this was a problem and many disappeared.

Delta Team was sent out to a facility that consists of many buildings that aren't connected to each other on the surface, but they is an underground passageway built in for certain occasions. The problem of this place is the placement, it is very common to be hit with heavy snowstorms and so people usually stay inside most of the time. Those who get out during the snowstorm disappear without a trace...okay scratch that there are usually just a giant scene of blood. Its unknown on how radio silence happened, but it seems someone had opened the window, or maybe there's something in the storm...
125331.title: Rescue mission!

info.brief_description: An alien invasion, are you going to defend your homeland or are you the invader?
info.description:
The only thing to say is, are you the alien invader or are you a resident of earth? In this interactive story there are no limits, no restrictions, so anything can happen, and I mean anything.

Rules:
1. To understand some of the alien species mentioned, you either need a good imagination or a good understanding of video games
2. Otherwise go crazy, any can happen in an alien invasion right?

Authors note: Don't worry about anything you add it, just have good spelling and grammer.
